denise gold.where: I never left the party, all thanks to Garrett's personal circus.
denise gold.relationship: Garrett was my husband. That's it.{garrett's marriage}
denise gold.default: I have nothing to say about that.
denise gold.garrett's marriage: Don't stick your nose in my affairs. I know, go ask Melissa how she killed Garrett. I know she did it.{denise accuses melissa}
denise gold.roy calls garrett by first name: Those two never got along, they were always at each other's throats.
denise gold.garrett left the party: He leaves, he always leaves. It's what he does.
denise gold.rumors about garrett: I can agree with some of those.
denise gold.photograph 1: So, that's how he died... I told him to get rid of that sword, but he'd never let go of it.
denise gold.sword: He should've gotten rid of that thing. I know, go ask Alexander how he feels being the previous owner of the murder weapon.{denise accuses alexander}

denise gold[TAUNT].where: I never left the party, all thanks to that witch Melissa.
denise gold[TAUNT].relationship: Garrett was my husband, until he was seduced by Melissa.
denise gold[TAUNT].default: Shouldn't you be looking into Melissa?
denise gold[TAUNT].garrett's marriage: Melissa destroyed everything. Go ask her how she killed Garrett, who else would?{denise accuses melissa}
denise gold[TAUNT].roy calls garrett by first name: Those two would've gotten along if the maid didn't poison Garrett's mind.
denise gold[TAUNT].garrett left the party: I'm one-hundred-percent confident he left to go spend time with his maid.
denise gold[TAUNT].denise stand down[LIE]: [melissa did not chase garrett] Detective, don't listen to them, listen to me. I saw Melissa chase after Garrett. I know she wanted to kill him.{melissa chased garrett}
denise gold[TAUNT].denise stand down[TRUTH]: Fine, listen to them. It's true, I didn't see Melissa leave the party. But you want to make the mistake of trusting the witch and her crow? Go ahead.
denise gold[TAUNT].photograph 1: I told him to get rid of that thing. Melissa must've convinced him to hold onto it.
denise gold[TAUNT].sword: This thing. Go ask Alexander about the blood on his hands.{denise accuses alexander}

roy gold.where: I was sitting in that corner of the room during the party. I was playing games the whole time. Didn't really see anything.
roy gold.relationship: Garrett was my father.{roy calls garrett by first name}
roy gold.default: Never seen this in my life.
roy gold.roy calls garrett by first name: Biologically, we may be related. But I never want to call that man my father any more than I have to.
roy gold.lawrence accuses roy: Well, that's not very nice. Can I accuse him of being the rudest person in this building?
roy gold.garrett left the party: I was too busy playing video games to notice him leaving the party.
roy gold.garrett's marriage: Those two have argued more than the hours I've put into my video games. And video games are the only friends I have.
roy gold.sword: He cares too much about that thing.

roy gold[VENGEANCE].where [LIE]: [lawrence accuses roy]I was here playing games the whole time. Didn't see or talk to anyone.
roy gold[VENGEANCE].where [TRUTH]: That little... Let me tell you the truth. I was in my room, I didn't want to attend Garrett's party. I heard a commotion, and saw Lawrence with Garrett entering the office. Lawrence had to be the murderer.{roy accuses lawrence}
roy gold[VENGEANCE].relationship: Garrett was my father. {roy calls garrett by first name}
roy gold[VENGEANCE].default: Never seen this in my life.
roy gold[VENGEANCE].roy calls garrett by first name: Sure, look at the blood and we're related. But I get sick every time I have to call that man my father.
roy gold[VENGEANCE].garrett's marriage: I'd call their marriage a nightmare that never ends.
roy gold[VENGEANCE].rumors about garrett: Where can I read more of these? They're pretty accurate.
roy gold[VENGEANCE].sword: He cared more about that thing than his own family.

alexander norman.where: I arrived a tad bit late to the party, traffic is quite the devil.
alexander norman.relationship: He was my finest client. I'm an art collector, you see, and Garrett was always hungry for my masterpieces.
alexander norman.denise accuses alexander: That woman should put more of her energy into grieving for her husband than flinging accusations at the innocent.
alexander norman.garrett left the party: Ah, such a shame. He was already gone from the party when I arrived late.
alexander norman.rumors about garrett: Everyone has their fair share of experiences with him. I've had some of the better ones to myself.
alexander norman.photograph 1: That poor soul. He didn't deserve to have his life severed short in such a violent manner.
alexander norman.sword: Ah, this fine sword. I recognize this, I sold this fine specimen to Garrett many years ago. Such a shame that it'd take his life.

alexander norman[SCOUNDREL].where[LIE]: [alexander was late]I arrived early to the party, first guest to grace the ballroom floor!{alexander was early}
alexander norman[SCOUNDREL].where[TRUTH]: I can hear them stifling their laughter! Let it be known that I was late to the party, but only because the devil of traffic would not let me be free.
alexander norman[SCOUNDREL].relationship: My finest client. You see, I'm an art collector, and Garrett was always interested in my masterpieces.
alexander norman[SCOUNDREL].denise accuses alexander: I wonder to myself if I should envy that woman's capacity for wasteful anger and empty accusations.
alexander norman[SCOUNDREL].garrett left the party: Ah, what a pity. I didn't catch sight of that gentleman leaving the party.
alexander norman[SCOUNDREL].garrett's marriage: A crash course with emphasis on crash.
alexander norman[SCOUNDREL].rumors about garrett: I've enjoyed the kinder experiences with him. A luxury, to be sure.
alexander norman[SCOUNDREL].photograph 1: Poor Garrett. It shouldn't have been like this.
alexander norman[SCOUNDREL].sword: Ah, this. I sold this fine sword to Garrett many years ago. I never predicted it would take his life.

lawrence edgar.where[LIE]: [roy accuses lawrence]I was having a fantastic time at the party, and that's when I noticed that reporter nosing around. He ruined the mood, so I called the guards to throw that trash out! If anyone killed my best friend, it was him.{lawrence accuses nathan}
lawrence edgar.where[TRUTH]: My greatest apologies, Detective. I did spend some time alone with Garrett during the party to talk business, to take his company to the next level.{lawrence was with garrett}
lawrence edgar.relationship: Garrett was my business partner, my best friend even! We've known each other since high school! I was the one who funded his company.
lawrence edgar.default: Never seen this. Can I pay you to take this away?
lawrence edgar.lawrence accuses nathan[LIE]: [lawrence's documents]Oh come on, you know it has to be that reporter. Why else would he be snooping around here? If you want another idea, I'll give you the son. Hates his dad, wouldn't miss seeing him gone. Probably wanted his inheritance early.{lawrence accuses roy}
lawrence edgar.lawrence accuses nathan[TRUTH]: That's impossible, how did you find those! I thought I got rid of them!{lawrence hid the documents}
lawrence edgar.garrett left the party: He went to his office. Hey, I bet that gardener jumped into his office through an open window.{kevin jumped down}
lawrence edgar.kevin did not jump down: Okay, so the gardener didn't jump into the office. I was just trying to help, throw some random ideas out there.
lawrence edgar.garrett's marriage: I keep telling him to find a different partner! Ditch the woman, ditch the son too!
lawrence edgar.rumors about garrett: Can you tell me the names of the people talking ill of my best friend?
lawrence edgar.photograph 1: Wow. That's an awful sight, I'm sorry for what happened to him. I hope his death was painless.
lawrence edgar.sword[LIE]: [lawrence's gloves]This thing's expensive. I've never seen it before in my life! I couldn't stand to get blood on my hands.
lawrence edgar.sword[TRUTH]: How did you find my gloves, I thought I got rid of them! That damn gardener didn't do his job right!{lawrence threw away his gloves}

nathan colt.where: I was at the party the entire time. Well, until Mr. Edgar and his henchmen tossed me out the front door.
nathan colt.relationship: I never knew him personally, but I heard rumors that he's a terrible person. Ask the others about that.{rumors about garrett}
nathan colt.default: What's this? Is it important to your investigation?
nathan colt.lawrence accuses nathan: Now that's just messed up. I'm a reporter, not a thief.
nathan colt.kevin jumped down: That gardener jumped through the window? Yeah, if he was a ghost. I got a glance and that window was sealed shut like a castle gate.
nathan colt.garrett left the party: I never got the chance to speak to him, it was like I was last in line.
nathan colt.denise accuses melissa: That nice maid couldn't hurt a butterfly. That wife would crush butterflies for fun though!
nathan colt.photograph 1: This isn't the first murder I've seen, but this is a grisly one. I'm throwing a wild guess but maybe that gardener was involved.{nathan accuses kevin}
nathan colt.sword: This is the murder weapon? Awful.

nathan colt [THIEF].where: I was at the party the entire time. But then Mr. Edgar and his henchmen sent me out the front door.
nathan colt [THIEF].relationship: I never knew him, and I don't want to. He's a terrible person connected to terrible people, ask the others.{rumors about garrett}
nathan colt [THIEF].default: What's this? Doesn't look like something I can write about.
nathan colt [THIEF].lawrence accuses nathan: He's right. Take a look at this.{lawrence's documents}
nathan colt [THIEF].kevin jumped down: I'd love to see the gardener jump through a closed window. That window was shut tight.
nathan colt [THIEF].garrett left the party: I never got the chance to speak to him, and I'm glad I never got to.
nathan colt [THIEF].denise accuses melissa: Garrett may be evil, but his staff are angels. Especially that maid. His wife on the other hand, eh...
nathan colt [THIEF].photograph 1: ...Detective, this is out of the blue, but I have a feeling that the gardener was involved.{nathan accuses kevin}
nathan colt [THIEF].sword: This is the murder weapon? Terrible.

joseph stewart.where: I was at the party, looking for the master. I assumed he would be at his office, and that's where I went. I didn't expect the poor master dead in his own sanctuary.
joseph stewart.relationship: The master and I have been working together for many, many long years.
joseph stewart.default: I'm sorry but I cannot be of service to you. This item is unfamiliar.
joseph stewart.garrett left the party: Melissa was the person who informed me of the master's leave. That's when I started to search for him.
joseph stewart.denise accuses melissa: That vixen should keep her claws away from Melissa. Tell her to stop with these baseless accusations.{denise stand down}
joseph stewart.melissa chased garrett: Outrageous! Melissa stayed at the party while I went looking for the master. That woman is overstepping her boundaries.{melissa did not chase garrett}
joseph stewart.kevin jumped down: The window was sealed completely shut in the office when I found the master's body. Mr. Edgar will have to concoct another fantasy.{kevin did not jump down}
joseph stewart.alexander was early: When will Mr. Norman ever learn... Take his words with a grain of salt, he was late to the party.
joseph stewart.rumors about garrett: Everyone has had different experiences with the master, but I can assure you that the staff here have only had kind moments with him.
joseph stewart.photograph 1: Yes. This photograph captures exactly what I saw when I opened that door.
joseph stewart.sword: One of the master's most prized possessions. It's regretful that it's become the murder weapon.

melissa bailey.where: I was at the party, serving food and drinks to all the guests. That's when I caught a glance of the master leaving the party.{garrett left the party}
melissa bailey.relationship: Garrett wasn't just my employer, he saved my life. He paid off my debt, gave me a job, and gave me a home to stay in.
melissa bailey.default: My apologies, but I don't recognize this...
melissa bailey.garrett left the party: He's made a habit of leaving large gatherings, so I didn't question it at the time.
melissa bailey.denise accuses melissa: I... I don't know what I've done to deserve this blame.
melissa bailey.melissa chased garrett: That's just silly! I never left the party, it was Joseph who went looking for the master!
melissa bailey.alexander was early: Oh, typical Mr. Norman. He claims to always be early, but he's always late.
melissa bailey.rumors about garrett: That's preposterous! The master is one of the nicest, kindest people I've met in my entire life!
melissa bailey.photograph 1: Oh my god... Who could've done such a thing to him.
melissa bailey.sword: That was one of his most prized possessions. He would never let me dust it off for him.

kevin shepherd.where: I was outside, tending to the plants. They're very needy. I did see Mr. Edgar and the guards throw out that reporter.
kevin shepherd.relationship: I tended to his gardens, to every single leaf and branch and weed you can find out here.
kevin shepherd.default: I can't help you with this one.
kevin shepherd.nathan accuses kevin: What? I would never take a bribe! That's crazy!
kevin shepherd.kevin jumped down: Huh? I didn't go in Mr. Gold's office, and especially not through his window. Mr. Gold's office window was closed the entire time.
kevin shepherd.alexander was early: Mr. Norman, early? If he tells you that he's early, that means that he's late. I saw him sneaking through the front door late into the party.{alexander was late}
kevin shepherd.rumors about garrett: He treated me fairly well. If he didn't, well, I would've thrashed his plants by now.
kevin shepherd.photograph 1: What an awful way to die...
kevin shepherd.sword: I've seen this in his office.

kevin shepherd[ACCOMPLICE].where: I wasn't in the mansion at all. I was outside, taking care of the plants. I did see the guards throw out that reporter.
kevin shepherd[ACCOMPLICE].relationship: I tended to his gardens, to every single leaf and branch and weed you can find out here.
kevin shepherd[ACCOMPLICE].default: I can't help you with this.
kevin shepherd[ACCOMPLICE].nathan accuses kevin: Impossible, how did you know? Mr. Edgar promised me a suitcase of cash for burying his gloves. Here, I still have them.{lawrence's gloves}
kevin shepherd[ACCOMPLICE].rumors about garrett: I don't have much to say about him.
kevin shepherd[ACCOMPLICE].photograph 1: I can't imagine how painful that must've been...
kevin shepherd[ACCOMPLICE].sword: I've seen this on the wall in his office.

guards.where: We were called over to the party from the security room to throw out that reporter. Got promised a nice bonus for making it quick.
guards.relationship: We worked for him, pay was good.
guards.default: We don't know anything about that.
guards.sword: We thought he was crazy for holding onto that thing.
